member.summary: MainPage represents the Silverlight media player assembly.

member.summary: Initializes a new instaneof the MinPage type.
member.param: String Relative path to the media file.
String Media title.

member.name: M:MediaPlayer.MainPage.mediaPlayer_MediaOpened(System.Object,System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)
member.summary: Silverlight Mediaelement Media Opened handler. Sets Progress Bar and Slider maximums to media file duration in millisecs.
member.param: mediaPlayer
Contains state information and event data associated with a routed event.

member.name: M:MediaPlayer.MainPage.volSlider_ValueChanged(System.Object,System.Windows.RoutedPropertyChangedEventArgs{System.Double})
member.summary: Volume slider value change handler. Adjusts the media volume based on the slider value.
member.param: volSlder
Contains state information and event data associated with a routed property chnge.

member.summary: Volume button click handler. Toggles media muting.
member.param: volBtn
Contains state information and event data associated with a routed event.

member.name: M:MediaPlayer.MainPage.screenBtn_Click(System.Object,System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)
member.summary: Fullscreen button click handler. Toggles fullscreen.
member.param: screenBtn
Contains state information and event data associated with a routed event.

member.name: M:MediaPlayer.MainPage.playBtn_Click(System.Object,System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)
member.summary: Play button click handler. Toggles Play/Pause
member.param: playBtn
Contains state information and event data associated with a routed event.

member.name: M:MediaPlayer.MainPage.hideControls(System.Object,System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: Hides user controls. Delayed by timer. Invoked by mous exiting the controls canvas.
member.param: controls
Contains state information and event data associated with a mouse event.

member.name: M:MediaPlayer.MainPage.showControls(System.Object,System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: Shows user controls. Invoked by mouse entering the placeholder Rectangle.
member.param: Contains state information and event data associated with a mouse event.

member.name: M:MediaPlayer.MainPage.showVol(System.Object,System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: Shows volume controls. Invoked by mouse entering volBtn.
member.param: volBtn
Contains state information and event data associated with a mouse event.

member.name: M:MediaPlayer.MainPage.hideVol(System.Object,System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: Hides volume controls. Invoked by mouse exiting volBtn.
member.param: volBtn
Contains state information and event data associated with a mouse event.

member.name: M:MediaPlayer.MainPage.progSlider_MouseLeftButtonDown(System.Object,System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs)
member.summary: Progress slider left mouse button down handler. Sets the slider position based on mouse button click (supports dragging).
member.param: progSlider
Contains state information and event data associated with a mouse button event.

member.name: T:MediaPlayer.WebContext
member.summary: Context for the RIA application.
member.remarks: This context extends the base to make application services and types available for consumption from code and xaml.

member.name: M:MediaPlayer.WebContext.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the WebContext class.

member.name: P:MediaPlayer.WebContext.Current
member.summary: Gets the context that is registered as a lifetime object with the current application.
member.exception: is thrown if there is no current application, no contexts have been added, or more than one context has been added.
